title: Definition of direct joint variation
text: In a direct relationship, variables are directly proportional. This means that as $$x$$ or $$z$$ increases, $$y$$ increases, and vice versa.

title: General form
text: If "y varies jointly with $$x$$ and z," then the general form of our relationship will be $$y=kxz$$.

title: Solving for k.
text: Substitute $$x=2$$, $$z=3$$ and $$y=36$$ into our relationship $$y$$ $$=$$ kxz to solve for k. What do you get?

title: Put it all together
text: Now all you have to do is substitute k into the general form to get your equation!
